Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultMediaType As MediaTypeHeaderValue
static member DefaultMediaType : System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue

Docs.summary: Gets the default media type for xml, namely "application/xml".
Docs.value:
The default media type does not have any charset parameter as the can be configured on a per instance basis.
Because is mutable, the value returned will be a new instance every time.
